content.question: Which of the following is an example of a superimposed boundary?

choices.label: The geometric boundary between the United States and Canada
The border of the European Union
The Pyrenees Mountains between France and Spain
The geometric boundary between Iraq and Saudi Arabia

content.answer: The geometric boundary between Iraq and Saudi Arabia

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe a relevant geographic concept, process, model, or theory in a specified context.
